mapper.select: select * from(select rownum rn, v.* from (select b.*, m.member_image, m.member_name, (select count(*) from review r where r.review_no = b.board_no) cnt from board b left join member m on b.board_writer_no = m.member_no where b.board_type =1 order by b.board_date desc) v) z where z.rn between ((#{pageNum} - 1) * 4 + 1) and (#{pageNum} * 4)
select b.*, m.member_image, m.member_name from board b left join member m on b.board_writer_no = m.member_no where b.board_no=#{boardNo}

select r.*, m.member_image, m.member_name from review r join board b on r.review_board_no=b.board_no left join member m on r.review_writer_no=m.member_no where review_board_no=#{boardNo} order by review_ref, review_no

select count(*) count from board b left join member m on m.member_no=b.board_writer_no where board_type=1 and board_state!=0 and board_category=#{category } and (b.board_content like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or b.board_title like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or m.member_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

choose.when: insert into review values(#{reviewNo}, #{reviewNo}, null, null, #{reviewBoardNo}, #{reviewWriterNo}, #{reviewContent}, null, sysdate, 1, 3)
insert into review values(#{reviewNo}, #{reviewRef}, null, null, #{reviewBoardNo}, #{reviewWriterNo}, #{reviewContent}, null, sysdate, 1, 3)

select claim_seq.nextval from dual
insert into claim values(#{claimNo}, 3, #{claimApplicantNo}, #{claimSuspectNo}, null, #{claimSuspectReviewNo}, sysdate, #{claimReason}, 1)
mapper.select: select * from claim where claim_suspect_review_no=#{reviewNo} and claim_state=1
select rownum, b.* from (select * from board where board_type=1 and board_state=1 order by board_date desc) b where rownum between 1 and 4
